sumColumn

public java.lang.Object sumColumn(int colNum)
Sums a column of Numbers. 1) If the column contains only non-atomic Number objects, returns the sum. 2) If the column contains any other Object besides non-atomic Number Objects, the column is printed delimited by spaces. NOTE THAT THE RETURN TYPE WILL BE THAT OF THE WIDEST NUMBER TYPE IN THE COLUMN (case 1), OR A STRING (case 2).

Parameters:
colNum - Column index you wish to sum, starts at 0.
Returns:
